XOCHI Asset Pack (Atomic PNGs)
=============================

This folder contains one sprite / icon / tileset strip per PNG, cropped tightly with a transparent background.
Filenames are intended to be stable identifiers for Claude Code (or any build pipeline).

Conventions
-----------
- All PNGs: RGBA with transparency.
- Items are ordered left-to-right within a row as they appeared on the original sheet.
- Tileset chunks are ordered top-to-bottom, left-to-right as they appeared on the original sheet.

Sprites
-------

### Player (XOCHI, 16x16-style)
- xochi_idle.png  — XOCHI idle pose (single frame).
- xochi_walk.png  — XOCHI walking pose (single frame).
- xochi_jump.png  — XOCHI jump pose (single frame).
- xochi_fall.png  — XOCHI falling pose (single frame).

### Player (BIG XOCHI, 32x32-style)
- big_xochi_big.png        — Powered-up / big XOCHI (single character render).
- big_xochi_idle_small.png — Small “idle” render used in the big-XOCHI panel.

Collectibles
------------
- baby_pink.png   — Baby axolotl (pink).
- baby_blue.png   — Baby axolotl (blue).
- baby_yellow.png — Baby axolotl (yellow).
- baby_green.png  — Baby axolotl (green).

Enemies
-------
- enemy_seagull_1.png — Seagull enemy (variant 1 / leftmost on the sheet).
- enemy_seagull_2.png — Seagull enemy (variant 2 / next to seagull_1).
- enemy_heron.png     — Heron enemy.
- enemy_rock.png      — Rock/obstacle enemy.

Items & Power-ups
-----------------
Top row (left → right):
- item_row1_01.png — Item icon #01 (top row, leftmost).
- item_row1_02.png — Item icon #02.
- item_row1_03.png — Item icon #03.
- item_row1_04.png — Item icon #04.
- item_row1_05.png — Item icon #05.
- item_row1_06.png — Item icon #06.
- item_row1_07.png — Item icon #07.
- item_row1_08.png — Item icon #08.
- item_row1_09.png — Item icon #09.
- item_row1_10.png — Item icon #10 (top row, rightmost).

Second row (right-side power-ups, left → right):
- item_row2_01.png — Power-up icon #01 (second row, right section).
- item_row2_02.png — Power-up icon #02 (second row, right section).

Tilesets
--------
Tileset strips/chunks (top → bottom, left → right):
- tileset_chunk_01.png — Tileset chunk #01.
- tileset_chunk_02.png — Tileset chunk #02.
- tileset_chunk_03.png — Tileset chunk #03.
- tileset_chunk_04.png — Tileset chunk #04.
- tileset_chunk_05.png — Tileset chunk #05.
- tileset_chunk_06.png — Tileset chunk #06.
- tileset_chunk_07.png — Tileset chunk #07.
